Test.name: Basic in-process API
Test.WhatTest:
Test some functionalities of the in-process interface (jade.wrapper package) by running the ThanksAgent example.
In particular, the following APIs are tested:
jade.core.Agent.getContainerController()
jade.wrapper.AgentContainer.createNewAgent with null as third argument
jade.wrapper.AgentContainer.kill
jade.wrapper.AgentController.start() with null as third argument
new jade.core.ProfileImpl(false) for creating a default container
Runtime.instance().createAgentContainer(profile) for creating a new container
message communication between the 3 created agents
Test.HowWorkTest: The examples.thanksAgent.ThanksAgent is created. The code of this agent uses the jade.wrapper APIs in order to create a new agent on the same container, and a new agent on a new container. The 3 agents exchange then some ACLMessages.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the 3 agents are created and they have received all the exepected messages and, at then end, the number of containers is still the same than it was initially.
